= Introduction =

This project contains a miscellanea of distributions mainly related
with my activity as a lecturer at [http://www.ull.es Universidad de La Laguna]


= Math::Calculator =

This is an introductory example used in _Procesadores_ _de_ 
_Lenguajes_ ([http://nereida.deioc.ull.es/~pl/perlexamples PL])
to illustrate the use of [http://search.cpan.org/perldoc?Parse::Eyapp Parse::Eyapp].

  * To get a copy of the Calculator example (an introduction to Parse::Eyapp)
    issue the following command:

{{{
svn checkout http://misc-perl-utilities.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/calculator
}}}
